name: Jonah Lomu Rugby
description: Codemasters offers Jonah Lomu Rugby. Try it once and you're converted. The biggest name in rugby stars in the best game the sport's ever seen. With all the passion and all the action of the real thing, Jonah Lomu Rugby is the leader of the pack. 32 Rugby Union teams including New Zealand, England, Australia and France. Commentary from TV's Bill McLaren and Bill Beaumont. Up to 4 player simultaneous action.
